content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #156:

Lightbeam was removed in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3390 as explained in RFC 14. I think we're still interested in new backends but they'll need to go through the RFC process, so I'm going to close this.

alexcrichton closed issue #156:

Now having the lightbeam backend being added, I am curious on what is the scope of this project. Will it be beneficial to add, say, wasmi backend (for ensuring correctness) or llvm for highly optimized builds?
